formatEther(totalSupply)
totalSupply = await token.totalSupply();
token = await ethers.getContractAt("ClassToken", address);
address = '0x30F8E83081B324CC87ED55F902Fb919Dc993D36d';
formatEther = ethers.utils.formatEther;
formatEther(totalSupply)

formatEther(totalSupply)
